headline: Should You Buy Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) Stock Before May 6?
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD) supplies some of the world's best semiconductors, including a growing portfolio of chips specifically designed to handle artificial intelligence (AI) workloads in data centers and personal computers.  Investors can expect to learn more about the company's progress, and perhaps even receive an updated forecast from CEO Lisa Su regarding AI chip sales for 2025.  AMD launched its MI300X AI graphics processing unit (GPU) for the data center in late 2023.
